The '''Completely Repaired Holy Lyre der Himmel''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained after completing the {{Quest|Crystal Tears}}.

During the quest, the [[Partially Repaired Holy Lyre der Himmel]] is fully repaired after purifying three [[Teardrop Crystal]]s. It then becomes [[Damaged Holy Lyre der Himmel|damaged]] during the events of the {{Quest|Reunion With the Dragon}}.
